body_html:
0.10/0.11: Yeah.. Tensorflow 0.10 used an older version of GetMatchingFiles that just looked at the base directory for matches and couldn't recursive look into sub dirs etc. We updated that in 0.11.

IsDirectory(): We have a plugin model for file systems... for a new file system like this I would imagine that someone would have implemented our file_system interface (tensorflow/core/platform/file_system.h). Would be good to see that implementation.
body_text:
0.10/0.11: Yeah.. Tensorflow 0.10 used an older version of GetMatchingFiles that just looked at the base directory for matches and couldn't recursive look into sub dirs etc. We updated that in 0.11.
IsDirectory(): We have a plugin model for file systems... for a new file system like this I would imagine that someone would have implemented our file_system interface (tensorflow/core/platform/file_system.h). Would be good to see that implementation.
body:
**0.10/0.11:** Yeah.. Tensorflow 0.10 used an older version of GetMatchingFiles that just looked at the base directory for matches and couldn't recursive look into sub dirs etc. We updated that in 0.11.

**IsDirectory():** We have a plugin model for file systems... for a new file system like this I would imagine that someone would have implemented our file_system interface (tensorflow/core/platform/file_system.h). Would be good to see that implementation.
